value.name: Dead woman’s family to receive $3 million
value.description: State Police Officer Oliver Wilson shot and killed 39-year-old Jeanette Anaya around 1 a.m. Nov. 7, 2013, after Wilson tried to pull her over for what the officer contended was a questionable turn ...

value.name: Officer in fatal Santa Fe shooting was not disciplined
value.description: SANTA FE, N.M. — After several requests from the Journal, a state police spokesman said on Friday that the officer who shot Jeanette Anaya to death after a vehicle pursuit in Santa Fe in ...

value.name: Rash of police shootings renews calls for reform
value.description: State police have also come under scrutiny after four recent cases of officers using deadly force, including the shooting of 39-year-old Jeanette Anaya following a chase on the streets of Santa Fe.
